Uses of Class
pull_model.Agent

    • Uses of Agent in pull_model

      Subclasses of Agent in pull_model 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  LazyAgent<T>
      Proxy whose purpose is to add "laziness" to another dynamics.
      class  SourceAgent<T>
      Implementation of a source agent, which keeps the same opinion (called correct opinion) throughout the execution.
      class  TrendAgent
      Implementation of the "Follow the Trend" algorithm from Early Adapting to Trends: Self-Stabilizing Information Spread using Passive Communication.
      class  VoterAgent<T>
      Implementation of the well-known Voter dynamics.
      Constructors in pull_model with parameters of type Agent 
      Constructor Description
      LazyAgent​(Agent<T> encapsulatedAgent, int clockDuration)
      Constructs a LazyAgent that will execute the update method of the encapsulated agent every LazyAgent.clockDuration activations.
      Constructor parameters in pull_model with type arguments of type Agent 
      Constructor Description
      Dynamics​(java.util.ArrayList<Agent<T>> agents, boolean parallel)
